entry.title: Blitcoin? (Black Hat 2011)
entry.summary: At the Black Hat 2011 conference, Dan Kaminsky discussed potential security vulnerabilities in Bitcoin transactions. While details were sparse, an article on the topic mentions a tool called "blitcoin" that can reveal both sides of a transaction. Despite some misspellings online, there is little additional information available regarding this tool or other potential security risks in the Bitcoin network.
